item.title: Build personal website
item.description: Use Hugo Quick steps to publish #logseq pages TODO Clone logseq-schrodinger-template and put it under main domain turtletree.github.io TODO Replace content with my own exported, unzipped content TODO Update config.yml with personal info More features Check all Logseq Format make sure it works TODO Add logseq-publish Action for automated CI TODO Add Graph in main menu, reference the example of brian sunter TODO Add multi language selector TODO Able to switch themes
